name: CPU K8s Deployment
description: Template for configuring and deploying a K8s type worker node and connect it to a master node.

parameters.host: IP or hostname where the master node resides.
parameters.port: The port on which the cluster is exposed on.
parameters.token: The token for connecting the worker node to the master node.
parameters.sha256: The discovery token CA cert hash.
parameters.version: The version, in major.minor format, for Kubernetes tools that will be installed.
